fields.label: Slides
fields.name: slickity_slides
fields.instructions: Click 'Add Slide' to create a new slide for the slideshow.

sub_fields.label: Thumbnail
sub_fields.name: thumbnail
sub_fields.instructions: Enable alternative slideshow content for the thumbnail slider when the  'Thumbnail Slideshow' is enabled.

sub_fields.label: Content
sub_fields.name: slide_content
sub_fields.instructions: Create the slide content below.

sub_fields.label: CSS Class
sub_fields.name: css
sub_fields.instructions: You can easily style each slide by adding a CSS class below. Separate multiple classes with a space.

sub_fields.label: Thumbnail Content
sub_fields.name: thumbnail_content
sub_fields.instructions: Create the thumbnail content below.

sub_fields.label: CSS Class
sub_fields.name: thumbnail_css
sub_fields.instructions: You can easily style each thumbnail by adding a CSS class below. Separate multiple classes with a space.

fields.label: Thumbnail Slideshow
fields.name: slickity_thumbnail
fields.instructions: Displays a thumbnail slideshow directly below the main slideshow.

fields.label: Main Slideshow Settings
fields.name: slickity_main_settings
fields.instructions: For more information on the available settings, see http://kenwheeler.github.io/slick/#settings.

sub_fields.label: CSS Class
sub_fields.name: css
sub_fields.instructions: You can easily style the slideshow by adding a CSS class below. Separate multiple classes with a space.

sub_fields.label: Slides to Show
sub_fields.name: slidesToShow
sub_fields.instructions: Number of slides to show.

sub_fields.label: Slides to Scroll
sub_fields.name: slidesToScroll
sub_fields.instructions: Number of slides to scroll.

sub_fields.label: Infinite
sub_fields.name: infinite
sub_fields.instructions: Enable infinite loop sliding.

sub_fields.label: Adaptive Height
sub_fields.name: adaptiveHeight
sub_fields.instructions: Enables adaptive height for single slide horizontal carousels.

sub_fields.label: Autoplay
sub_fields.name: autoplay
sub_fields.instructions: Enables autoplay of the slideshow.

sub_fields.label: Arrows
sub_fields.name: arrows
sub_fields.instructions: Enable prev/next arrows.

sub_fields.label: Previous Arrow
sub_fields.name: prevArrow
sub_fields.instructions: Allows you to select a node or customize the HTML for the "Previous" arrow. Accepts HTML.

sub_fields.label: Next Arrow
sub_fields.name: nextArrow
sub_fields.instructions: Allows you to select a node or customize the HTML for the "Next" arrow. Accepts HTML.

sub_fields.label: Dots
sub_fields.name: dots
sub_fields.instructions: Enable dot indicators.

sub_fields.label: Responsive
sub_fields.name: responsive
sub_fields.instructions: Enables responsive settings for different breakpoints.

sub_fields.label: Mobile First
sub_fields.name: mobileFirst
sub_fields.instructions: Applies the main settings to mobile first.

sub_fields.label: Responsive Options
sub_fields.name: responsive_options
sub_fields.instructions: Click 'Add Breakpoint' to define settings for individual breakpoints, then click 'Add Setting' to add additional settings. For information on the available settings, see http://kenwheeler.github.io/slick/#settings.

sub_fields.label: Additional Settings
sub_fields.name: additional_settings
sub_fields.instructions: Click 'Add Setting' to add additional settings. For information on the available settings, see http://kenwheeler.github.io/slick/#settings.

fields.label: Thumbnail Slideshow Settings
fields.name: slickity_thumbnail_settings
fields.instructions: For more information on the available settings, see http://kenwheeler.github.io/slick/#settings.
